attributes.action: understand his Government was elected to represent the viewpoint of the British people rather than impose his own personal agenda on the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No one I know voted for uncontrolled immigration, savage tax rises, a benefits culture and putting the rights of minority groups ahead of the majority. Listen to the majority of decent people Mr Blair and stop pandering to the liberal elite.

rejection.details: Please provide a specific action for HM Government.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
